attributes.action: ask Northumberland County Council to reconsider its decision to close 7 day care centres for elderly and vulnerable adults in Northumberland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Northumberland County Council is on the verge of closing 7 day care centres for elderly and vulnerable adults in Amble, Bedlington, Blyth, Haltwhistle, Hexham, Prudhoe and Ponteland.

These day care centres provide a vital service to the local community, and should not be closed to save money.  

No-one has any objection to paying taxes for these services - this is what we pay council tax for.  

We ask Northumberland County Council to reconsider its decision to close these 7 day care centres, and if it needs to save money, to look elsewhere for savings.
